article_title: Congressman Yoho hosts town hall meeting in Hamilton County for region

article_metadata.author:
Joyce Marie Taylor
joycemarie.taylor@gaflnews.com

og.description: Republican U.S. Congressman Ted Yoho, FL-District 3, held a congressional town hall meeting at the Ernest Courtoy Civic Center in Jasper Tuesday evening, May 26, for constituents in the area
